description: Represents a build configuration for UET, which can be used to specify how to build an Unreal Engine plugin or project, or Unreal Engine itself.

Type.description: Specifies the type of thing that this BuildConfig.json file builds, such as whether this is for building a plugin, project or Unreal Engine itself.

items.description: Specifies how to build, cook, test and deploy an Unreal Engine project.

Name.description: The name, as passed to the --distribution argument.

FolderName.description: The relative path that the .uproject file is located underneath.

ProjectName.description: The name of the .uproject file underneath the folder, without the .uproject extension.

Prepare.description: Specifies the preparation scripts to run before various steps. You can specify multiple preparation entries.

items.description: A dynamically driven preparation, test or deployment step.

Name.description: The name of the job/step as it would be displayed on a build server. This must be unique amongst all tests defined.

Manual.description: If set, this will be emitted as a manual job on build servers. Only applies to deployments. Defaults to false.

Predefined.description: The predefined name defined earlier in configuration.

Targets.description: A list of targets to build.

items.description: A list of targets to build.

Platforms.description: A list of platforms to build the project for.

Platform.description: The platform name to build the project for.

CookFlavors.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.

items.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.
If not specified, defaults to ["Development", "Shipping"].

Targets.description: A list of targets to build.

items.description: A list of targets to build.

Platforms.description: A list of platforms to build the project for.

Platform.description: The platform name to build the project for.

CookFlavors.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.

items.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.
If not specified, defaults to ["Development", "Shipping"].

items.description: A list of targets to build.

Platforms.description: A list of platforms to build the project for.

Platform.description: The platform name to build the project for.

CookFlavors.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.

items.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.
If not specified, defaults to ["Development", "Shipping"].

Tests.description: A list of tests to run for the project.

items.description: A dynamically driven preparation, test or deployment step.

Name.description: The name of the job/step as it would be displayed on a build server. This must be unique amongst all tests defined.

Manual.description: If set, this will be emitted as a manual job on build servers. Only applies to deployments. Defaults to false.

Predefined.description: The predefined name defined earlier in configuration.

Deployment.description: A list of deployments to run for the project.

items.description: A dynamically driven preparation, test or deployment step.

Name.description: The name of the job/step as it would be displayed on a build server. This must be unique amongst all tests defined.

Manual.description: If set, this will be emitted as a manual job on build servers. Only applies to deployments. Defaults to false.

Predefined.description: The predefined name defined earlier in configuration.

MobileProvisions.description: A list of mobile provisions to install to the local machine before building this project.

PluginName.description: The name of your plugin. It must be such that "PluginName/PluginName.uplugin" exists.

Header.description: Used for Marketplace/Fab submissions and update-copyright command.

ExcludePaths.description: If set, these files will not have their headers updated during packaging.

items.description: If set, these files will not have their headers updated during packaging.

Tests.description: A list of predefined tests that you can use with `uet test` or in other "Tests" sections for distributions.

items.description: A dynamically driven preparation, test or deployment step that is defined outside of a distribution, where dependencies need to be specified.

ShortName.description: For tests defined outside of distributions, an optional shorter name that can be used with `uet test`.

Dependencies.description: Specifies how to how to package and build the plugin so this test can be run.

EnvironmentVariables.description: A list of environment variables to set during the build.

additionalProperties.description: A list of environment variables to set during the build.

Platforms.description: A list of platforms to build the plugin for on the editor target.

items.description: A list of platforms to build the plugin for on the editor target.

Platforms.description: A list of platforms to build the plugin for on the target.

Platform.description: The platform name to build the project for.

CookFlavors.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.

items.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.
If not specified, defaults to ["Development", "Shipping"].

Platforms.description: A list of platforms to build the plugin for on the target.

Platform.description: The platform name to build the project for.

CookFlavors.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.

items.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.
If not specified, defaults to ["Development", "Shipping"].

CookFlavors.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.

items.description: The flavors to cook an Android platform for. e.g. ASTC, DXT, ETC2, Multi.
If not specified, defaults to ["Development", "Shipping"].

Type.description: Defines the package type, such as whether it is being packaged for Marketplace or Fab submission. One of 'None', 'Generic', 'Marketplace' or 'Fab'. If not set, defaults to 'None'.

Filter.description: The path to the FilterPlugin.ini file used for packaging.

Predefined.description: The predefined name defined earlier in configuration.

EnvironmentVariables.description: A list of environment variables to set during the build.

additionalProperties.description: A list of environment variables to set during the build.

Filespecs.description: A list of filespecs that should be cleaned. Use * as a wildcard for a single path component, or ... as a wildcard for multiple path components.

items.description: A list of filespecs that should be cleaned. Use * as a wildcard for a single path component, or ... as a wildcard for multiple path components.
